pr_title: Fix error while updating frontend resource client from the api

timeline.bodyText: I think this is confusing because it could mean get all sample/patient/study resource data. Maybe getAllStudyResourceDataInStudy?
timeline.author: adamabeshouse

replies.bodyText: for consistency with the other methods how about getAllResourceDataOfStudy
replies.author: adamabeshouse
